title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 580.2 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 580.2 - General

State Regulations
(a) The vehicle and
traffic laws of the State of New York are applicable and enforceable on campus
roadways. Drivers are expected to obey State laws and to know and observe
college parking regulations. Changing conditions may necessitate revisions to
this Part and, upon sufficient notice, any revised regulation or regulations
will become enforceable. (b) All
college regulations related to motor vehicles on the campus are enforceable at
all times throughout the year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
580.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
